Text:
Hi HVOM,

Wow, thanks for the ABBA.  I have theses cd's 
myself, and they sound the best - NOT all loud
and compressed and dripping with noise reduction.

Recommended !!

Beatle Tom
These are the ones to have,again my undying gratitude-tom

Nice that you like it. "The Album" (Polydor) isn't that good due to a bad source which is causing some distortion. The alternative is to go for the 2001 remaster which is based on good tapes but with less dynamics.

Thanks hvom  +1 (but stuck at 90%)

I'll check to see if I have Waterloo 1988 Polar (POLCD 252).
Yabetaripper: That would be perfect. Please let me know if you have it.
This looks interesting, many thanks! Weird that "remasters" are usually the worst sounding releases, isn't it? Thankfully, there is TPB. :)
